body_html:
I tried this in Tensorflow 0.10. I changed to use WholeFileReader instead of TextLineReader.
I get the following error tensorflow.python.framework.errors.InvalidArgumentError: Unquoted fields cannot have quotes/CRLFs inside

Also I have another question about using a WholeFileReader. If the input csv file is large wouldn't WholeFileReader bring all of the data into memory, causing an out of memory error?
Also there would be no way to skip header lines if I use a WholeFileReader right?

Also there would be no way to skip header lines if I use a WholeFileReader right?
body:
I tried this in Tensorflow 0.10. I changed to use WholeFileReader instead of TextLineReader.
I get the following error `tensorflow.python.framework.errors.InvalidArgumentError: Unquoted fields cannot have quotes/CRLFs inside`

Also I have another question about using a WholeFileReader. If the input csv file is large wouldn't WholeFileReader bring all of the data into memory, causing an out of memory error? 
Also there would be no way to skip header lines if I use a WholeFileReader right?
